title: 10 Trends in Web Development to Watch in 2025
content:
The Future of Web Development

As we approach 2025, web development continues to evolve rapidly. In this post, we highlight 10 trends that will shape the future of the industry.

1. JavaScript Frameworks Continue to Evolve

JavaScript frameworks like React.js and Vue.js have been dominating the web development world for years, and their evolution will continue in 2025.

2. The Rise of Progressive Web Apps

PWAs are increasingly being seen as a great alternative to traditional native apps. Expect more companies to leverage PWAs in 2025.

3. AI and Automation in Web Development

AI-powered tools will help developers write better code and automate repetitive tasks.
author: Jane Smith
